The BOOST_PP_SEQ_REVERSE macro reverses a seq.

Usage

BOOST_PP_SEQ_REVERSE(seq)

Arguments

seq
The seq to be reversed.

Remarks

For maximum efficiency, use BOOST_PP_SEQ_REVERSE_S.

See Also

  • BOOST_PP_SEQ_REVERSE_S

Requirements

Header:  <boost/preprocessor/seq/reverse.hpp>

Sample Code 

#include <boost/preprocessor/seq/reverse.hpp>

#define SEQ (1)(2)(3)

BOOST_PP_SEQ_REVERSE(SEQ) // expands to (3)(2)(1)
